players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Let's discuss the case openly. I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso. We need to keep an eye on him."
You: "I am innocent. I did not kill Alice."
Charlie: "I believe Diana's investigation. Bob, you need to prove your innocence."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
